title: Bangalore 101 - Pedestrian Safety
description:
The Indian constitution guarantees the right of free movement to every citizen. But in Bangalore, that’s a challenge and then some. Bengaluru is the city with the third highest number of pedestrian deaths annually. In 2017 alone, 282 of them were killed in our city.

A weekly explainer on a topic that matters
#bengaluru #citizenmatters #bangalore101 #conversationswithmanasi

Location courtesy Katte - The Creative Community

title: Bangalore 101 - Pothole Compensation
description:
Now how many of you know that if you suffer an injury because of a pothole in the city, the BBMP has to pay you compensation? 
The High Court of Karnataka passed this order in July.

A weekly explainer on a topic that matters
#bengaluru #citizenmatters #bangalore101 #conversationswithmanasi

Location courtesy Katte - The Creative Community

title: Citizens Live : Fridays For Future
description:
One of the issues that has really been a rallying war cry is that Climate Change. 
Greta Thunberg, the 16-year-old Swedish activist had called for a worldwide protest in September which saw thousands of people flood the street across cities.
An offshoot of that movement was Fridays For Future, a group of dedicated young people working on it.
#bengaluru #citizenslive #conversationswithmanasi

Location courtesy Katte - The Creative Community

title: Bangalore 101 - Bellandur Lake Pollution
description:
To understand the problem of the lakes, we need to understand their system, the lakes in Bengaluru flow cascade into one another. The land gradient of the city supports this system so the surplus water that we get from the rains wouldn’t flood the surrounding areas.

A weekly explainer on a topic that matters
#bengaluru #citizenmatters #bangalore101 #conversationswithmanasi

title: Bangalore 101 - By Elections Dec 2019
description:
The up coming by elections in the State on December 5th has four constituencies from Bangalore going to the polls - Yeshvanthpur, K R Puram, Mahalakshmi Layout, and Shivajinagar. The first three have the current (disqualified) MLAs returning as candidates albeit from a different part. What did they do in the one and half year that they were your MLA.
A weekly explainer on a topic that matters
#bengaluru #citizenmatters #bangalore101 #conversationswithmanasi

title: Bangalore 101 - Child Safety
description:
So just how do we keep our children safe? They aren’t safe in schools, public places and even their own homes. How do you, as the primary guardian of your child, do this.
A weekly explainer on a topic that matters
#bengaluru #citizenmatters #bangalore101 #conversationswithmanasi

title: Bangalore 101 - Ward Committees
description:
A year ago, the then-Mayor of Bengaluru, Gangambika Mallikarjun directed BBMP councillors to hold ward committee meetings on the first Saturday of every month.
A year later, we look into where things stand. How effective have ward committee meetings been?
A weekly explainer on a topic that matters
#bengaluru #citizenmatters #bangalore101 #conversationswithmanasi

title: Citizens Live : Shashi Verma - CTO Transport For London
description: Transport For London is an integrated system that deals with public transport in all its forms, its Chief Technology Officer - Shashi Verma was in Bangalore to discuss ideas with the State Government on maximising the usage of public transport.

title: Citizens Live : Bhaskar Rao (IPS)
description:
An important aspect that plays on our mind about public transport is our personal safety. Women especially, are always at the bottom of the ladder in terms of safety parameters.
We sat down for a chat with Bhaskar Rao, Commissioner of Police, Bangalore City, as what are the measures and challenges towards this.
#bengaluru #citizenslive #conversationswithmanasi

title: Citizens Live: Worshipful Mayor - Gangambike Mallikarjun
description:
#bengaluru #citizenslive #conversationswithmanasi
With less than a week left to go for before she steps down from office, she sat down for a chat with us at Citizens’ Live to talk about all that she could accomplish in her time and all that she couldn’t.

title: Citizens Live: Pramila Aiyappa & Shalini Saraswathi
description:
Are the sports Infrastructure and facilities in our cities adequate ? What are the challenges athletes in the city face while training.
#conversationswithmanasi #citizenslive
